verses.text: \w Let|strong="G3306"\w* brotherly \w love|strong="G5360"\w* \w continue|strong="G3306"\w*.

\w Be|strong="G1950"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w forgetful|strong="G1950"\w* to entertain \w strangers|strong="G5381"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w there|strong="G3778"\w*\w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* have \w entertained|strong="G3579"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w unawares|strong="G2990"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="G3403"\w* them that are in \w bonds|strong="G1198"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* bound with \w them|strong="G4887"\w*; \add and\add* them which suffer \w adversity|strong="G2558"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w being|strong="G5607"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*.

\w Marriage|strong="G1062"\w* \add is\add* \w honourable|strong="G5093"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w bed|strong="G2845"\w* \w undefiled|strong="G0283"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w whoremongers|strong="G4205"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w adulterers|strong="G3432"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* will \w judge|strong="G2919"\w*.

\add Let your\add* \w conversation|strong="G5158"\w* \add be\add* without \w covetousness|strong="G0866"\w*; \add and be\add* \w content|strong="G0714"\w* with such things as ye \w have|strong="G3918"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* hath \w said|strong="G2046"\w*, I \w will|strong="G0447"\w* \w never|strong="G3756"\w* \w leave|strong="G0447"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w forsake|strong="G1459"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*.

So \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* \w may|strong="G3004"\w* \w boldly|strong="G2292"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, The \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \add is\add* \w my|strong="G1698"\w* \w helper|strong="G0998"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w will|strong="G5399"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w fear|strong="G5399"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* shall \w do|strong="G4160"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="G3421"\w* them which have the rule \w over|strong="G2233"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w who|strong="G3748"\w* have \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w follow|strong="G3401"\w*, \w considering|strong="G0333"\w* the \w end|strong="G1545"\w* \w of|strong="G0391"\w* \add their\add* \w conversation|strong="G0391"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w yesterday|strong="G5504"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w day|strong="G4594"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*.

\w Be|strong="G4064"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* carried \w about|strong="G4064"\w* with \w divers|strong="G4164"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strange|strong="G3581"\w* \w doctrines|strong="G1322"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \add it is\add* a good \w thing|strong="G2570"\w* \w that|strong="G0950"\w* the \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* be \w established|strong="G0950"\w* with \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* with \w meats|strong="G1033"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G5623"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w profited|strong="G5623"\w* them that have been \w occupied|strong="G4043"\w* \w therein|strong="G1722"\w*.

We \w have|strong="G2192"\w* an \w altar|strong="G2379"\w*, \w where|strong="G3739"\w*\w of|strong="G1537"\w* they \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w right|strong="G1849"\w* to \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* which \w serve|strong="G3000"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="G4633"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w bodies|strong="G4983"\w* \w of|strong="G2226"\w* \w those|strong="G5130"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2226"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* is \w brought|strong="G1533"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sanctuary|strong="G0039"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, are \w burned|strong="G2618"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w* the \w camp|strong="G3925"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he might \w sanctify|strong="G0037"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w* the \w gate|strong="G4439"\w*.

Let us go \w forth|strong="G1831"\w* \w therefore|strong="G5106"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w* the \w camp|strong="G3925"\w*, \w bearing|strong="G5342"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w reproach|strong="G3680"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w* have \w we|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w continuing|strong="G3306"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* we \w seek|strong="G1934"\w* one to \w come|strong="G3195"\w*.

\w By|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* let us \w offer|strong="G0399"\w* the \w sacrifice|strong="G2378"\w* of \w praise|strong="G0133"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w continually|strong="G1275"\w*, \w that|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, the \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* \w of|strong="G5491"\w* \add our\add* \w lips|strong="G5491"\w* giving \w thanks|strong="G3670"\w* \w to|strong="G3686"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* to do \w good|strong="G2140"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w communicate|strong="G2842"\w* \w forget|strong="G1950"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* with \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="G2378"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* is well \w pleased|strong="G2100"\w*.

\w Obey|strong="G3982"\w* them that have the rule \w over|strong="G2233"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* submit \w yourselves|strong="G5226"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w watch|strong="G0069"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w souls|strong="G5590"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* they that must \w give|strong="G0591"\w* \w account|strong="G3056"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they may \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w it|strong="G5124"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* with \w grief|strong="G4727"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w that|strong="G5124"\w* \add is\add* \w unprofitable|strong="G0255"\w* for \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w Pray|strong="G4336"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* we \w trust|strong="G3982"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G4893"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w willing|strong="G2309"\w* to \w live|strong="G0390"\w* \w honestly|strong="G2573"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \add you\add* the \w rather|strong="G4056"\w* to \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I may be \w restored|strong="G0600"\w* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w* the \w sooner|strong="G5032"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, that brought \w again|strong="G0321"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w that|strong="G4166"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w shepherd|strong="G4166"\w* of the \w sheep|strong="G4263"\w*, \w through|strong="G1722"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w the|strong="G1242"\w* \w everlasting|strong="G0166"\w* \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w*,

\w Make|strong="G2675"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w perfect|strong="G2675"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*, \w working|strong="G4160"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* that which is \w wellpleasing|strong="G2101"\w* \w in|strong="G1799"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w sight|strong="G1799"\w*, \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*; to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \add be\add* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* I \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w suffer|strong="G0430"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w exhortation|strong="G3874"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I have written a \w letter|strong="G1989"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w in|strong="G1223"\w* few \w words|strong="G1024"\w*.

Know \w ye|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G0080"\w* \add our\add* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w Timothy|strong="G5095"\w* is set at \w liberty|strong="G0630"\w*; \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* he \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w shortly|strong="G5032"\w*, I will \w see|strong="G3700"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* them that have the rule \w over|strong="G2233"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*. \w They|strong="G0782"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w Italy|strong="G2482"\w* \w salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.
\w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*. Written to the Hebrews from Italy by Timothy.
